name: poznote
description: Poznote is a self-hosted personal note-taking platform with Markdown support, folders, tags, and a focus on simplicity and privacy. It uses a lightweight interface for managing text-based knowledge.
features: Markdown support: Write notes in Markdown with live preview and syntax highlighting.
Folder organization: Organize notes into hierarchical folders for structured knowledge management.
Tag system: Apply tags to notes for flexible categorization beyond folder structures.
Search functionality: Find notes quickly using full-text search across titles and content.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted deployment ensures complete control over your personal notes and data.
Lightweight interface: Minimal, fast-loading UI designed for distraction-free note-taking.
Note linking: Create connections between notes with internal links for building knowledge networks.
Export options: Export notes in Markdown, HTML, or plain text formats for backup or sharing.
Version history: Track changes to notes over time with the ability to restore previous versions.
Attachments: Add files and images to notes for comprehensive documentation.
Mobile responsive: Access and edit notes from any device with an optimized mobile interface.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and edit notes efficiently with customizable keyboard commands.
